meanings.definition: In a way that relates to or involves two or more countries.
meanings.sent1: She traveled internationally to attend the conference.
meanings.sent2: The company operates internationally, with offices in multiple countries.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to go on an internationally themed vacation.
meanings.sent4: His music spread internationally like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The idea of peace was embraced internationally after the treaty was signed.

meanings.definition: By people or organizations in different countries.
meanings.sent1: They communicated internationally through video calls.
meanings.sent2: The charity received donations internationally to support their cause.
meanings.sent3: The cats formed an internationally recognized club for napping.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was shared internationally, gaining recognition worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The news of the discovery spread internationally within hours.
